dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, Zhaslan Madiyev just confirmed the likely location for CryptoCity—Alatau.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Zhaslan Madiyev just confirmed the likely location for CryptoCity-Alatau.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the sidelines of the Astana International Forum (AIF), Madiyev said the city is likely to be established in Alatau, a new urban development project initiated by the President.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, that new city project the President initiated. That makes a lot of sense for something this ambitious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, that new city project the President initiated. That makes a lot of sense for something this ambitious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the sidelines of the Astana International Forum (AIF), Madiyev said the city is likely to be established in Alatau, a new urban development project initiated by the President.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he mentioned it'd be a place where you could use crypto to pay for everything—restaurants, real estate, even investments.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he mentioned it'd be a place where you could use crypto to pay for everything-restaurants, real estate, even investments.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The concept is that cryptocurrency would be used as a means of payment " to pay in restaurants, cafes, buy real estate, make investments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's huge. But uh, he also emphasized they still need to work on the regulatory framework, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's huge. But uh, he also emphasized they still need to work on the regulatory framework, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Right now, we need to work on the regulatory framework. The city itself is already under development, but we must establish the necessary regulatory environment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They want crypto-friendly laws, free circulation, all of it legally recognized. It's not just about building the city itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They want crypto-friendly laws, free circulation, all of it legally recognized. It's not just about building the city itself.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: CryptoCity implies free circulation of cryptocurrency, crypto-friendly legislation, and crypto as a legitimate means of payment. These conditions need to be reflected in the law," he added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, attracting developers and IT specialists could really give their economy a boost, like he said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, attracting developers and I T specialists could really give their economy a boost, like he said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Madiyev, the creation of CryptoCity would attract developers, programmers, and IT specialists to Kazakhstan, giving a new boost to economic growth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And President Tokayev himself announced it earlier at the Astana International Forum, so it's clearly a top-down initiative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And President Tokayev himself announced it earlier at the Astana International Forum, so it's clearly a top-down initiative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, during the opening plenary session of the AIF, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev announced plans to create an innovative zone called CryptoCity in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think other countries might follow suit if this takes off?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think other countries might follow suit if this takes off?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Possibly. Kazakhstan's really positioning itself as a crypto hub, especially with this kind of experimental zone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Possibly. Kazakhstan's really positioning itself as a crypto hub, especially with this kind of experimental zone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But the regulatory part is gonna be tricky. Like, how do you ensure stability and prevent misuse?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the regulatory part is gonna be tricky. Like, how do you ensure stability and prevent misuse?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's the big challenge. Madiyev seemed aware of that—they can't just build it and hope for the best.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's the big challenge. Madiyev seemed aware of that-they can't just build it and hope for the best.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, if they pull it off, Alatau could become a global model for crypto integration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, if they pull it off, Alatau could become a global model for crypto integration.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's one of those high-risk, high-reward moves.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's one of those high-risk, high-reward moves.
